description.displayText: Deeply compassionate. Personifies what anyone could and would hope to see in someone caring for your family member. Dedicated and dependable.
description.originalText: Deeply compassionate. Personifies what anyone could and would hope to see in someone caring for your family member. Dedicated and dependable.

description.displayText: Ashontia is an exceptional caregiver. She took care of both my elderly parents who had dementia and both of them had very different personalities. Ashontia was able to single-handedly handle both of them with no problem. She is patient, kind, loving and caring. She goes above and beyond her job and provides comfort, companionship, and love. She has a beautiful heart and truly treats her care-giving as a ministry to help others. Thank you Ashontia!
description.originalText: Ashontia is an exceptional caregiver. She took care of both my elderly parents who had dementia and both of them had very different personalities. Ashontia was able to single-handedly handle both of them with no problem. She is patient, kind, loving and caring. She goes above and beyond her job and provides comfort, companionship, and love. She has a beautiful heart and truly treats her care-giving as a ministry to help others. Thank you Ashontia!

description.displayText:
In addition to being unfailingly reliable and punctual, Ashontia (Shon) is amazingly dedicated and loving. She is driven by a true spirit of care and is proactive in her approach to each day.

As a busy executive, I particularly appreciated that I did not have to micromanage Shon or tell her what to do.  She brings her whole self to her position every day.  In addition to providing care in my home, she also coordinated other care givers for me to ensure the schedule was always covered.  If there ever was an issue in coverage, she proactively resolved it rather than asking me to do so.

Shon also brings upbeat energy to her job.  Even when the day is tough, her smile and laughter elevate everyone's mood.  Shon also is extremely trustworthy.  She often provided care in my home over weekends when we were out-of-town.  I highly recommend her!
